definition: tending to talk a great deal; talkative
sentence: Her loquacious nature made her the life of the party.
Her tremulous voice revealed her nervousness during the speech.

definition: having or showing puzzlement or curiosity
sentence: He gave me a quizzical look after I made the unusual suggestion.

definition: so good or unusual that it is impossible to copy; unique
sentence: Her inimitable style set her apart from other designers.

definition: disliking humankind and avoiding human society
sentence: His misanthropic tendencies made it difficult for him to form friendships.

definition: to confuse or disconcert; upset; frustrate
sentence: The sudden change in plans seemed to discombobulate everyone involved.
The obstreperous children ran around the playground, ignoring the teacher's calls.

definition: of, resembling, or relating to twilight.
sentence: The crepuscular light gave the forest an ethereal glow.

definition: characteristic of or resembling a seraph or seraphim; blissful and angelic.
sentence: The child's seraphic smile warmed the hearts of everyone around her.
It is paradoxical that the more we learn, the more we realize how much we do not know.
